content: a snap-button crochet fidget stress toy carrot transforms step by step into a bunny we complete the product by crocheting the bunny and assembling the toy ⸻ what s inside this 2-part crochet series snap-button fidget structure that makes a click sound when pressed non-collapsing carrot top no sinking shape crochet pattern for the snap-button bunny fidget final assembly of the amigurumi toy ⸻ ✨ you can use this model as ✔ a keychain ✔ a bag charm ✔ a crochet fidget toy ✔ a handmade gift ⸻ ▶️ part 1 clicking crochet carrot fidget why doesn t the top collapse ▶️ part 2 this video snap-button bunny crochet & finishing ⸻ designed for crocheters amigurumi lovers diy fidget toys handmade & tactile stress toys
